ce_contrat_de_licence_utilisateur_final_: This End User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you ("user") and Connect & Move ("licensor") regarding the use of the Connect & Move mobile application.

connect_move_taccorde_une_licence_person: Connect & Move grants you a personal, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the application on your devices for strictly personal and non-commercial use, in accordance with this EULA.

il_tappartient_de_consulter_regulieremen: It is your responsibility to regularly review the EULA.
implication_calcul: Your involvement is calculated by equally combining your participation in discussions (50%) and your attendance at events (50%), resulting in a score out of 100%.
important_vous_napparaitrez_pas_dans_les: Important: you will not appear in partner search results until you have added a profile photo
lapplication_connect_move_est_concedee_s: The Connect & Move application is licensed, not sold.

likes_aux_partenaires_max_par_jour_5: 5 likes to partners max per day
mettez_des_images_qui_donneront_envie_de: Add images that will make people want to join your adventure
mettez_le_cout_de_ladhesion_a_votre_even: Enter the membership fee for your event (in euros) or leave at 0 if entry is free

paiement_par_apple_pay_et_carte_bancaire: Payment by Apple Pay and credit card

selon_le_type_de_compte_de_votre_ami: depending on your friend's account type
tapez_une_adresse_et_selectionnez_parmi_: Type an address and select from the suggestions
tous_les_droits_titres_et_interets_relat: All rights, titles, and interests relating to the application, including its code, content, and graphics, remain the exclusive property of Connect & Move.
tout_litige_relatif_a_son_interpretation: Any dispute relating to its interpretation or execution falls under the jurisdiction of the competent courts.
toute_modification_sera_publiee_sur_cett: Any modification will be published on this page.
une_erreur_est_survenue_contactez_votre_: An error has occurred, please contact your developer
votre_avis_nous_aide_a_ameliorer_lexperi: Your feedback helps us improve the experience for all users
votre_implication_est_calculee_en_combin: Your involvement is calculated by equally combining your participation in discussions (50%) and your presence at events (50%), giving a score out of 100%

vous_navez_pas_encore_de_notifications: You don't have any notifications yet
vous_navez_rejoint_aucune_activite_pour_: You haven't joined any activity yet
plan_free_ideal: Ideal for those discovering the app or occasionally participating in activities.
plan_free_features: Partner search with simple filters (proximity, activity type)
Access to 4 public events per month
Send up to 5 messages per day to new contacts
Add up to 4 friends per day to your network
Limited access to certain profiles (restricted info, blurred photos beyond the first)
plan_premium_ideal: Ideal for active users who want to maximize connections, expand their network, and enjoy full freedom to organize activities.
plan_premium_features: All free plan benefits, with no ads
Unlimited access to all public and premium events
Advanced search with detailed filters (age, fitness level, preferred time slots, etc.)
Unlimited creation of public or private activities
Profile highlighted in search results (increased visibility)
Access to personalized statistics (activity history, new contacts, etc.)
Creation of private mini-groups for regular activities
Unlimited friend additions to your network
plan_business_ideal: Ideal for businesses wishing to promote their activities, engage their community, and attract participants.
plan_business_features: Access to a professional dashboard to manage your events
Unlimited creation of sponsored events (afterworks, corporate activities, etc.)
Targeted notifications to promote your events to nearby users
Event personalization with branding to enhance your image
Access to detailed statistics (number of participants, interactions, feedback)
Priority placement in the "sponsored events" section of the app
Dedicated support for organizing special campaigns
parrainage_description: Users earn points based on actions taken in the app. Points can be exchanged for free premium months. The more engaging and beneficial actions are for the app, the more points they earn.
parrainage_filleul_bonus: Bonus points on sign-up with a code
parrainage_filleul_bonus_explication: When a referred user signs up with a referral code, they receive 15 points directly.
parrainage_filleul_premium: Temporary Premium Access (10 days free, no billing)
parrainage_filleul_premium_explication1: Referred users can enjoy 10 days of free premium access when signing up with a referral code, with no automatic subscription initiated.
parrainage_filleul_premium_explication2: This temporary premium access gives them a taste of the benefits.
particuliers_titre: For Individuals: A Simple Tool to Never Be Alone
particuliers_feature_1: Find activity partners based on your location and interests
particuliers_feature_2: Chat, propose, or join outings near you
particuliers_feature_3: Create your profile, filter by your preferences, and expand your social circle
particuliers_feature_4: Experience a city or region differently, through sharing and shared experiences
entreprises_titre: For Businesses: Increase Visibility and Attract an Active Community
entreprises_feature_1: Create a dedicated profile in the app, with your hours, contact info, photos, and offers
entreprises_feature_2: Publish events or announcements (special evenings, happy hours, promotions, open houses, etc.)
entreprises_feature_3: Attract a local, curious, and connected clientele seeking new experiences
entreprises_feature_4: Be highlighted as a partner venue to hundreds of active users in your area
entreprises_feature_5: With the business subscription, you get a complete platform to communicate locally, organize events, and bring people to your venues.
communaute_description: Whether you are an individual or a business, Connect & Move is here to help you:
communaute_point_3: Move, by meeting new people, new places, and new experiences
